description: Try our easy to follow Hasselback Lobster With Tartare Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lobster dishes,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Seafood,Dec 2019,Potato,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Nikki P,Chicken,Peanut free
name: Hasselback Lobster With Tartare Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 bunch dill (sprigs picked, and to garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: To make the tartare dressing, place all the ingredients, except chives, into a small food processor and process to combine. Transfer to a bowl, stir in chives and season to taste. Set aside.
Place butter and 1/4 cup tartare dressing into a bowl and stir to combine. Set aside.
Meanwhile, place onion and lemon juice in a small bowl and set aside to pickle slightly.
Steam potatoes following packet instructions. Transfer to a bowl, squash roughly, add half the butter mixture and toss to coat. Set aside.

Preheat oven grill to high. Place lobster meat on a board and make several cuts, two-thirds of the way through. Smear with remaining butter mixture and place onto a foil-lined baking tray. Grill for 3 minutes or until butter melts and lobster is golden and warmed through.
Transfer lobster to a serving platter with potatoes, onion, rocket and dill. Serve with remaining tartare dressing.
